```{python}
#| label: fig-smith-chart
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Smith chart showing constant resistance and reactance circles for impedance matching in RF circuits."

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pysmithchart

# Create a subplot that will use the Smith projection and include the minor grid
plt.figure(figsize=(6,6))
plt.subplot(1, 1, 1, projection="smith", axes_impedance=50, grid_minor_enable=True)

plt.plot([50 + 0j], markersize=10)
plt.show()
```
